price: 11.Oyo nde bokeli bwa Allah, bolakisa ngai oyo ya basusu. Kasi babubi bazali na libunga ya polele.
arabic: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hādhā khalqu al-lahi fa-arūnī mādhā khalaqa alladhīna min dūnihi bali al-ẓālimūna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
